body:
Many businesses are using data science to inform decisions and collaborate. Successfully embedding data science within a business requires incorporating data science within your business' strategy.

This module will help you plan how your business will map, describe, share and use data science to implement its vision. It explores why integrating data science with your strategy is important for a business, important components of embedding data science in a strategy, and how to embed data science within a business.
displayTitle: Embedding data science within a business
title: Embedding data science within a business

_skills.outcome: Explain the importance of embedding data science within a business' strategy
Describe the components of embedding data science strategy within a business' strategy
Explain how to embed data science within a business

body:
Startups form an important part of nearly every sector ecosystem.

Startups that successfully exploit data science understand where to acquire funding and support. They can navigate the ecosystem around them, understanding and interacting with the relevant people and organisations.

In this module, we'll explore the different stages of startups, the role of different funding sources and the additional support available so that startups can establish themselves within an ecosystem.
displayTitle: Exploring the startup ecosystem in Europe
title: Exploring the startup ecosystem in Europe

_skills.outcome: Explain different stages of startups within an ecosystem
Explain the role of different funding sources in a startup ecosystem
Explain additional support available in a startup ecosystem

body: In addition to exploiting data science within a business’s ecosystem, many businesses are now using data science techniques to collaborate, compete and disrupt entire sectors. In this module, we look at what a sector ecosystem is, common types of actors in a sector ecosystem and the differences between a closed, shared and open sector ecosystem.
title: Exploiting data science within sectors

_skills.outcome: Explain what a sector ecosystem is
List common actors in a sector ecosystem5
Explain the difference between a closed, shared and open sector ecosystem
Describe possible futures for sector ecosystems
